isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - OVERHEAD CABINETS, ACCENT LIGHTS

svcproc.title: OVERHEAD CABINETS, ACCENT LIGHTS
svcproc.para: With the accent lights on/off switch in the on position, power flows from battery stud (B2) through circuits 14AK, 14AV, fuse F10-D, circuit 14AX, fuse 582-C, circuit 63BA and accent lights on/off switch. From the switch power flows through circuits 63BB, 63BC and 63BD to the left, center and right accent lights. The ground path is circuits 63-GBD, 63-GBC, 63-GBB, 11-GAD, 11-GBD and 11-GBC to ground adapter (454). When the ignition is turned on, power energizes the panel light feed adapter (503) makes available power to circuit 62BP going to accent lights on/off switch. This illuminates the panel lamp LED through ground path 62-GY, 11-GAE, 11-GN, 11-GAF, 11-GBC, 11-GBD and 11-GBC to ground adapter (454).
